author: Victor Bergeron A.K.A Trader Vic
description: Slightly sweet and strong. According to Vic, "One sip and you may see a Menehune."
name: Menehune Juice
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
